hero.demoNote: No signup required for demo — try it in your browser.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for professional voice transcription
features.onDeviceDesc: Transcribe entirely on your device. No internet required, no data leaves your hands.
features.icloudDesc: Seamlessly sync your transcriptions across all your Apple devices with iCloud.
features.cloudModelsDesc: Opt in to the latest cloud AI models for enhanced accuracy when you choose.

platforms.title: Available on All Your Devices
platforms.subtitle: Seamless experience across the Apple ecosystem
platforms.ipadDesc: Optimized for iPad and iPad Pro
platforms.iphoneDesc: Record and transcribe on the go

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Transform how you capture and work with voice.

footer.tagline: Professional voice transcription for Mac, iPad, and iPhone. Private by design.

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: We're here to help. Choose the best way to reach us.

about.title: About {companyName}
about.subtitle: We believe voice is the most natural way to capture ideas — and that privacy should never be a compromise.
about.missionDesc: {companyName} builds tools that respect your privacy while delivering professional-grade results. {appName} is our first product — a voice transcription app that proves you don't have to choose between quality and privacy.
about.privacyDesc: We designed {appName} with a 100% on-device processing option. When you use the on-device model, your audio never leaves your device — not even to our servers. For cloud models, we use end-to-end encryption and never store your data.
about.ecosystemDesc: {appName} is a native app built for Mac, iPad, and iPhone. We leverage Apple's Neural Engine, iCloud sync, and platform APIs to deliver the best possible experience across all your devices.

knowledge.useCasesSubtitle: Discover how professionals use {appName} in their daily workflow.
knowledge.journalistsDesc: Record interviews and get instant transcriptions. Focus on the conversation, not note-taking.
knowledge.meetingsDesc: Capture every detail from meetings and brainstorming sessions. Never miss an action item again.
knowledge.studentsDesc: Transcribe lectures, seminars, and research interviews. Search through hours of audio instantly.
knowledge.creatorsDesc: Generate subtitles for videos, transcribe podcasts, and repurpose audio content into written form.
knowledge.analyticsSubtitle: Understand your transcription usage and quality metrics.
knowledge.usageInsightsDesc: {appName} provides anonymous, aggregated analytics to help you understand your transcription patterns — recording frequency, average duration, model preferences, and more. All analytics stay on your device.
knowledge.qualityMetricsDesc: Track transcription accuracy over time and see how different recording environments affect quality. Use these insights to optimize your workflow.
knowledge.analyticsComing: Detailed analytics dashboard coming in a future release.
knowledge.securitySubtitle: Your data security is our top priority. Here's how we protect you.
knowledge.onDeviceProcessingDesc: When using the on-device model, all audio processing happens locally on your Apple device using the Neural Engine. Zero data is transmitted anywhere.
knowledge.e2eEncryptionDesc: Cloud transcription uses TLS 1.3 for data in transit. Audio is encrypted before leaving your device and decrypted only after transcription is complete.
knowledge.zeroRetentionDesc: We never store your audio or transcriptions on our servers. Cloud processing is ephemeral — data is discarded immediately after transcription.
knowledge.icloudSecurityDesc: Transcriptions synced via iCloud are protected by Apple's encryption. We have no access to your iCloud data.
